stable.body:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`d029614`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/d029614178348ead69cb73d4249a4976ef84f2d9) - **Maps merge screen**: Add elevation to toolbar *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`9d55925`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/9d55925a45490f73f61e773d36e406879a6e83aa) - **Media overlay**: Toolbar animation and elevation, adapt system bars to light theme *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`4900311`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/4900311aa2a6cf0d8e36d6b88a946d0843b2522e) - UI improvements *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`5d01608`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/5d01608c59bd9aa23c87421e9bf5bd0c3db6cd8a) - Ability to report caught errors *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`99ea966`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/99ea9666d679d8b90078f6049d0d724c8fab1cee) - **Maps list**: Separate pager and header *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`5cb4c87`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/5cb4c87045c5dde0c6c47f0e01263bf6cd98ce93) - **Maps**: Option to dismiss thumbnail backup reminder permanently *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`42084a7`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/42084a7bb3558d65dd489e9245a289af8096e18a) - **Map materials**: Improve UI and UX *(PR #143 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`8aebeab`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/8aebeabaaa7320b6afa3247c7dfa86d0697397fa) - Improve toast contrast and animations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`7226b9b`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/7226b9b2f595d691acaab77d389515f040265fc4) - **Map editor**: Float options support, validate options before saving *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`842cd19`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/842cd1945d95d7a319ccf0c7dd71a53f5b795784) - **Permissions**: Check if given path is a directory *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c845631`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c84563116650340b8628cf971178e8cd93cbde87) - **Updates screen**: Use latest release info, add missing elevation to toolbar *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`bd1ad50`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/bd1ad5030b7515c410c75d7ce9064724c50f9150) - **Updates**: Restore update badge on settings button *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`674beda`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/674bedadbe60917e0c5c729a4e62619dddc69e14) - **Maps**: Force thumbnail to reload when thumbnail file is set *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c03478e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c03478ec3d21e4fa3c8f417b4b9f47829aab938a) - **Maps**: Avoid duplicating navigation entry *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`4c23f36`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/4c23f3631dbd7b259e5e3d60169c91e3c623263b) - **Maps**: Hide thumbnail viewer toolbar when the map is not imported *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`140a72d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/140a72d564a6022426d114db9bb7413ede1d7fd6) - **Updates screen**: Do not show open in browser label if not enough space *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`5cb2820`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/5cb2820d30d802ce7e2d716e2ee7af3ed6246390) - **FAB**: Adjust label visibility animation *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`a65d58e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/a65d58e250349457921d4ca70fc85bf1b544dcb4) - **Map merging**: Show select/deselect all option when multi-selecting *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`9b83b24`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/9b83b24554d3a91b0e4f91d1cedb4c153a09665d) - **Map editor**: Do not show "ghost" role when roles list is blank *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ôªÔ∏è Refactors
- [`3c7135a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/3c7135a05ddc94ce5b49de50a8856a05adbd9932) - Correct ViewModel handling by using domains and `viewModelOf` *(PR #141 by @aliernfrog)*

preRelease.body:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`d029614`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/d029614178348ead69cb73d4249a4976ef84f2d9) - **Maps merge screen**: Add elevation to toolbar *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`9d55925`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/9d55925a45490f73f61e773d36e406879a6e83aa) - **Media overlay**: Toolbar animation and elevation, adapt system bars to light theme *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`4900311`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/4900311aa2a6cf0d8e36d6b88a946d0843b2522e) - UI improvements *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`5d01608`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/5d01608c59bd9aa23c87421e9bf5bd0c3db6cd8a) - Ability to report caught errors *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`99ea966`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/99ea9666d679d8b90078f6049d0d724c8fab1cee) - **Maps list**: Separate pager and header *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`5cb4c87`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/5cb4c87045c5dde0c6c47f0e01263bf6cd98ce93) - **Maps**: Option to dismiss thumbnail backup reminder permanently *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`42084a7`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/42084a7bb3558d65dd489e9245a289af8096e18a) - **Map materials**: Improve UI and UX *(PR #143 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`8aebeab`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/8aebeabaaa7320b6afa3247c7dfa86d0697397fa) - Improve toast contrast and animations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`7226b9b`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/7226b9b2f595d691acaab77d389515f040265fc4) - **Map editor**: Float options support, validate options before saving *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`842cd19`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/842cd1945d95d7a319ccf0c7dd71a53f5b795784) - **Permissions**: Check if given path is a directory *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c845631`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c84563116650340b8628cf971178e8cd93cbde87) - **Updates screen**: Use latest release info, add missing elevation to toolbar *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`bd1ad50`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/bd1ad5030b7515c410c75d7ce9064724c50f9150) - **Updates**: Restore update badge on settings button *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`674beda`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/674bedadbe60917e0c5c729a4e62619dddc69e14) - **Maps**: Force thumbnail to reload when thumbnail file is set *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c03478e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c03478ec3d21e4fa3c8f417b4b9f47829aab938a) - **Maps**: Avoid duplicating navigation entry *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`4c23f36`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/4c23f3631dbd7b259e5e3d60169c91e3c623263b) - **Maps**: Hide thumbnail viewer toolbar when the map is not imported *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`140a72d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/140a72d564a6022426d114db9bb7413ede1d7fd6) - **Updates screen**: Do not show open in browser label if not enough space *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`5cb2820`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/5cb2820d30d802ce7e2d716e2ee7af3ed6246390) - **FAB**: Adjust label visibility animation *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`a65d58e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/a65d58e250349457921d4ca70fc85bf1b544dcb4) - **Map merging**: Show select/deselect all option when multi-selecting *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`9b83b24`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/9b83b24554d3a91b0e4f91d1cedb4c153a09665d) - **Map editor**: Do not show "ghost" role when roles list is blank *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ôªÔ∏è Refactors
- [`3c7135a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/3c7135a05ddc94ce5b49de50a8856a05adbd9932) - Correct ViewModel handling by using domains and `viewModelOf` *(PR #141 by @aliernfrog)*
